descriptionHtml:
[color=#a4c2f4]This mod simply adds a craftable set of light Ebony Armor and a light armored shield

There is a full outfit bonus for the light armor tree, also there is a No-Helmet Outfit bonus as I know people prefer this armor set without the helmet.
The Weight and Armor Rating are the same as Glass Armor
To make this armor you will need the perk " Ebony Smithing" and will need to be at a forge.

----- Light Helmet -----
Armor Rating: 16
Weight: 2
Crafted With: 3 Leather, an Ebony Ingot, 2 Leather Strips

----- Light Cuirass -----
Armor Rating: 38
Weight: 7
Crafted With: 3 Leather, 3 Ebony Ingots, 3 Leather Strips

----- Light Gauntlets -----
Armor Rating: 11
Weight: 2
Crafted With: 1 Leather, an Ebony Ingot, 2 Leather Strips

----- Light Boots -----
Armor Rating: 11
Weight 2
Crafted With: 1 Leather, an Ebony Ingot, 2 Leather Strips

----- Light Shield -----

Armor Rating: 27
Weight: 6
Crafted With: 2 Leather, 2 Ebony Ingots, Leather Strips

----- All are Improved with an Ebony Ingot the same as the heavy armor -----

----- No DLC's required. -----
----- Should be compatible with re-texture mods. -----
----- Should there be any questions or problems just ask in the comments section -----
Enjoy:)[/color]
author: Coope
